price: 59. L’Heure arrivera (il ne peut y avoir) nul doute à son propos. Mais la plupart des hommes n’y croient pas.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَأٓتِيَةٞ لَّا رَيۡبَ فِيهَا وَلَٰكِنَّ أَكۡثَرَ ٱلنَّاسِ لَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: inna al-sāʿata laātiyatun lā rayba fīhā walākinna akthara al-nāsi lā yu'minūna
